messages.msgSnippet: -=- We are consdering making a family trip down from Ontario to the conference.  Does anyone else travel down from Ontario?  Is there a billeting option, to
messages.messageBody:
-=- We are consdering making a family trip down from Ontario to the
conference. Does anyone else travel down from Ontario? Is there a
billeting option, to stay with families in the area, to save on costs? -=-

Hi Michele,

We're going to the conference again this year - from Hamilton, ON. We will
be staying at the hotel, though. It really *is* worth the money!!!

Karen




--

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] live and learn conference
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: Sears Family  We are consdering making a family trip down from Ontario to the conference. Does anyone else travel down
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Sears Family <brewstersears@...>

We are consdering making a family trip down from Ontario to the
conference.
Does anyone else travel down from Ontario? Is there a billeting
option, to stay
with families in the area, to save on costs?

-=-=-=-=-=-=-


Michele, you may find someone locally to stay with---and I'm not
discouraging it, because I'd rather have you come and stay with a local
than not come at all. *But* your staying at the hotel is how we "pay"
for the conference rooms, so I'd like to encouarge folks to stay at the
Sheraton. Plus, things are so busy at the conference---early mornings
and late nights and afternoon naps, maybe? <g> that you would probably
find that "commuting" is a pain.

You might have some luck finding folks to say with while travelling
there and back to save on $$$. That's what the yahoo group is for:
liveandlearnconference@yahoogroups.com ---to help you make those
arrangements.

Looking forward to meeting you!

~Kelly


Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
October 6-9, 2005
http://liveandlearnconference.org

messages.subject: live and learn conference
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, We are consdering making a family trip down from Ontario to the conference.  Does anyone else travel down from Ontario?  Is there a billeting option, to
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

We are consdering making a family trip down from Ontario to the conference. Does anyone else travel down from Ontario? Is there a billeting option, to stay with families in the area, to save on costs?

Michele

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
